title: (x) Better Homes and Gardens - Big Caslon, Freight Sans, Benton Sans {Stephen, Mike Y}
content:
Can anyone tell me what type is used for:

1. “Better Homes and Gardens” magazine banner (mag1)  
2. “Freshen Up” (mag1)  
3. sans serif type (mag1)  
4. “family fun” (mag2)  
5.”launch out a kite…” (mag2)

Thanks!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [mag1.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070304024842/http:/typophile.com/files/mag1.jpg) | 53.79 KB |
| [mag2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20070304024842/http:/typophile.com/files/mag2.jpg) | 67.84 KB |
author: ivana

comments.content:
The sans serif is [Freight Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20070304024842/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=verity.search&searchstr=Freight).  
The headline serif is [Big Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20070304024842/http:/www.fontshop.com/index.cfm?fuseaction=catalog.fontpackage&startrow=1&records=&currpage=1&totalrecords=4&displayfontid=CA.8425.0.0&fontRendererText=Freshen+Up).
3. Looks like News Gothic or Trade Gothic

\> _3. Looks like News Gothic or Trade Gothic_

Could it be Benson Gothic then? Seeing what the other two faces are.

_“Could it be Benson Gothic then? Seeing what the other two faces are.”_

Wouldn’t that be [_Benton_ Sans](http://web.archive.org/web/20070304024842/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/benton-sans/), Yves (After Morris Fuller B..)?

- Mike Yanega
